trans-unit.source: Defines a content decorator that can stretch and scale a single child to fill the available space.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个内容修饰器，以便拉伸或缩放单一子项使其填满可用的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> can only have one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>只能有一个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Child%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you add an additional <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Child%2A>, you cause an <xref:System.ArgumentException> at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你添加其他<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Child%2A>，则会导致<xref:System.ArgumentException>在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> and set common properties in code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>和在代码中设置通用属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> this element uses to arrange its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />，此元素使用它来排列其子元素。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 排列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that represents the arranged size of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> element and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />，表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 元素及其子元素的排列大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> always sets its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Child%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> 始终设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Child%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It then computes and applies a transformation from that <xref:System.Windows.Size> to the available space.
trans-unit.target: 它然后计算并应用于转换<xref:System.Windows.Size>到可用空间。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> determines available space by subtracting the margin of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Child%2A> from the input <xref:System.Windows.Size> of its elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> 通过减去的边距来确定可用空间其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Child%2A>从输入<xref:System.Windows.Size>的其元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the single child of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 元素的单一子元素。

trans-unit.source: The single child of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 元素的单一子元素。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: If you add an additional child element to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> it causes an <xref:System.ArgumentException> at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你添加到其他子元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>它会导致<xref:System.ArgumentException>在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> and then set its child property by using code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>然后通过使用代码中设置其子属性。

trans-unit.source: The index position of the wanted <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> child.
trans-unit.target: 所需 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 子级的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> child at the specified <paramref name="index" /> position.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定 <paramref name="index" /> 位置处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 子级。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> child of the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 父元素 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 的一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 子项。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate the logical children of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可迭代此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 元素的逻辑子元素的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> limit that <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> cannot exceed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 不能超过的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 限制。

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> prior to arranging them during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.WrapPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: 测量 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 的子元素，以便准备在 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.WrapPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> 过程中排列它们。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that represents the element size you want.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />，表示所需的元素大小。

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> typically calls this method, which performs the first layout pass.
trans-unit.target: 父<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>通常会调用此方法，用于执行在第一个布局处理过程。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> measures its child at an infinite `constraint`, allowing the child to be as large as it requires.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> 测量以无限其子元素`constraint`，使其子元素是因为它需要一样大。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Stretch" /> mode, which determines how content fits into the available space.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Stretch" /> 模式，该模式确定内容适应可用空间的方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Stretch" /> that determines how content fits in the available space.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Stretch" />，它确定内容如何适合可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Stretch.Uniform" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Stretch.Uniform" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> and then set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Stretch%2A> property by using code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>然后设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Stretch%2A>通过使用代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection" />, which determines how scaling is applied to the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection" />，它确定缩放如何应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection" /> that determines how scaling is applied to the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection" />，它确定缩放如何应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection.Both" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection.Both" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the scaling restrictions that apply to the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定将应用于的内容的缩放限制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>。

trans-unit.source: For example, use this property to prevent the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> from being smaller or larger than its original size.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用此属性以防止的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>遭到小于或大于其原始大小。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> and then set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.StretchDirection%2A> property by using code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>然后设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.StretchDirection%2A>通过使用代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.StretchDirection" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.StretchDirection" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Stretch" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox.Stretch" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects in this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 实例中的子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox" /> 对象数。

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> children.
trans-unit.target: 子级 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 的数目。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回 1。
